title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8122.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8122.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 3. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 3 between the intersection with Route
342 and a point 0.1+- mile west of Adelaide Street in the Village of Carthage; in the Towns of LeRay, Rutland, Champion, Wilna, and the Villages of Black

River, Deferiet, Herrings and Carthage. (b) Route 342. The eastbound and westbound
roadways between the intersection of IR 81 and the intersection of Route 3 in
the Towns of Pamelia and LeRay. (c) Route 283. The eastbound and westbound roadways of Route 283 between the
intersection of Route 342 and the main gate of Fort Drum in the Town of LeRay, the Village of Black River. (d) Route 12. The northbound and southbound roadways of Route 12, between IR 81 and
the St. Lawrence county line in the Town of Alexandria and the Village of

Alexandria Bay. (e) Route 11. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 11 between the intersection of

Route 342 and the St. Lawrence county line in the Towns of LeRay, Philadelphia
and Antwerp and the Villages of Evans Mills, Philadelphia and

Antwerp. (f) Route 3. The eastbound
and westbound roadway of Route 3 between the intersection with Route 342 and a
point 3.0+- miles west of said intersection being Roadway Express Terminal, in
the Towns of LeRay and Watertown. (g) Route 3A (CR 36). Route 3A (CR 36)
between the intersection of Route 3 at Fargo to the intersection of Route 3 in
the Village of Deferiet, a distance of 5.2+- miles. (h) Route 26. The northbound and southbound
roadways of Route 26 between the intersection of Route 3 at Great Bend and the

Lewis county line, a distance of 7.2+- miles in the Town of Champion and the

Village of West of West Carthage. (i) Route 12F. Route 12F between IR 81 and
971H, a distance of 2.1 miles in the Towns of Watertown amd

Hounsfield. (j) Route 971H. Route
971H between Route 12F and the James River Plant, a distance of 0.2+- mile in
the Town of Hounsfield and the Village of Brownville. (m) Route 37. Route 37 between the
intersection of Route 342 and the St. Lawrence county line, a distance of
24.5+- miles in the Towns of Pamelia, LeRay, Theresa, and Alexandria. (n) Route 12. Route 12 between

Jefferson-Lewis county line and IR 81, a distance of 15+- miles in the Towns of

Champion, Rutland, Watertown, and Pamelia, and the City of Watertown. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8122.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
